Package Project

Class Mosaic

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project.Mosaic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Luminosity
    public class Mosaic
extends java.lang.Object
implements Luminosity
    Class that creates the Mosaic, the final structure which is made of rectangular regions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  Mosaic.CompareArea
      Class used to compare rectangular regions by its area and name.
      class  Mosaic.RectangularRegion
      Inner class of Mosaic where we create the rectangular regions, the regions that compose a mosaic.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Mosaic​(java.lang.String file)
      Constructor that checks if the file exits and reads it line by line, if it is possible, creating a tile from each line until we get to the end of the file.

      • getTiles

        public Tile getTiles​(Coordinate c)
        Method that receives a coordinate by argument, checks if it exist in our mosaic and if it is we get the data of the tile that it is in this coordinate.
        Parameters:
        c - The coordinate, number of row and column, from which we want to get a tile.
        Returns:
        null if the coordinate does not exist or the data of the map tile at the given coordinate.

        Returns:

      • totalNumberFiguresClass

        public int totalNumberFiguresClass​(java.lang.String figureClass)
        Method that returns the number of tiles that contains a certain figure type into a mosaic.
        Parameters:
        figureClass - The type of figure of which we want to know how many times it appears in the mosaic.
        Returns:
        totalNumber The value that represents how many times a certain figure appears in a mosaic.

        Method that changes the luminosity in all the tiles of a mosaic.
        Specified by:
        changeLuminosity in interface Luminosity
        Parameters:

      • changeStatus

        public void changeStatus​(int value)
        Method that changes the status of all the mosaic tiles.
        Parameters:
        value - A integer: 0 (tile off), 1 (Tile on) or 2 (Figure off).
